citations.narrative:
Item Dealers and exhibitors 2.75 a 2
At the time of inspection a review of records for this facility showed they are using computerized records instead of the
required APHIS FORM 7005 Record of Acquisition of Dogs and Cats on hand. At this point in time facility does not have
approval for the use of this computerized system .
If the facility wishes to continue to use a computerized system it needs to obtain approval for a variance and insure the
records meet the requirements as indicated by the APHIS FORM 7005 or use the form 7005.
Correct by 10/30/2021

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Item Housekeeping 3.11 c
At the time of inspection it was noticed that the facility had damaged ceiling tiles due to water leaks, this does not
constitute maintaining the facility in good repair, nor does it protect the animals from injury.
Facility needs to insure the leak is repaired and and the ceiling tiles replaced so as insure the housing facilities is
maintained and good repair and protect the animals.
Correct by 10/30/2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee
End Section
